version_description:
- In app purchase panel improvements on iOS;

- Some fix.

- New: player fill screen aspect ratio;

- Swapped order of continue watchings and favorites categories;

- Improved next button in TV Shows;

- Fixed parental control in Live channels;

- Fixed cleaned title in change metadata screen.

- NEW: playlist details screen to read all about your playlist, including expiration date (where applicable) and other info - long press on the playlist to access to the button to open the info screen;

- Improved favorite, continue watching and added recently sync - if you see doubles or other weird behaviors, try to clean your playlist from settings or manually;

- FIX: allowed more playlists' type;

- FIX: in the method that determines if the content isLive;

- FIX: crash with the 'did you know' screen.

- NEW: Introduced category strategy for SMB; You can now decide if you want to consider the top folder or latest folder as category name;

- The app is now fully ported to tvOS 14 and iOS 14, and will allow development with the latest technologies;

- Improved TV Shows recognition algorithm;

- FIX: crash when loading the playlist;

- FIX: another crash that was due to a typo when favorites and continue watchings categories had been swapped;

- FIX: for certain Xtream API playlists, some LIVE channels/categories were going into the 'Movies' section;

- Minor other improvements.


Relevant updates from the VLC Player team:

- Fixes hardware decoding of AVC and HEVC 10 / 12bit on iOS/tvOS 14 (4k);
- Fix: recently introduced crash and infinite loading when downloading settings;

- FIX: crash happening when scrolling or randomly - this will require your playlist to be reloaded;

- FIX: crash when deleting all added recently;

- FIX: added recently reappearing when deleted all - if you need to clean them just delete them again and it will work;

- Other improvements.

- New: player's fill and crop aspect ratios;

- Fix: unsorted TV shows' episodes were put in a different container;

- Other improvements.


Thanks for your support and for being an IPTVX user!

For info and support: https://iptvx.app

For live updates please follow @matteo_gobbi on Twitter (Founder/developer account)

If you haven't already done it, please leave a review on the AppStore :)!
- Fix tvOS14 cells on TV Guide.

- NEW: recommended content in your playlist, based on the content you open. Open movie's details to see it! The more metadata you download, the more IPTVX will match recommended contents.

- FIX: a bug with metadata API when opening a playlist without reloading;

- IMPROVED: 'continue watching' sync between devices is still more real time;

- Minor other improvements.

- NEW: you can now choose the frequency of EPGs reload;

- Improved: your purchases receipt will now be verified locally in case Apple server are down, limiting issue in using the app;

- Improved: code and infrastucture to show promotions in the in-app purchase page;

- General code improvements which fixes an edge case crash.

- Titles cleaner improved to include another edge case;

- Fixed minor things.

- Started tracking crashes in a better way;

- Fixed crash when opening special content;

- Small improvements.

- NEW: Family sharing subscription is here!

- NEW: Added AppStore rating widget;

- Fixed reload in TV Shows movie page;

- Fixed crash when restoring an episode progress;

- Fixed crash in in-app purchase panel for devices with the operative system's version minor than 13.0;

- Enabled Marquee for "continue watching" content's title in the VOD list;

- Improved logic which calculates the next episode and relative user interface;

- Other minor crash fixes and bug fixes.

- NEW: Family sharing subscription is here!

- NEW: Added AppStore rating widget;

- Fixed reload in TV Shows movie page;

- Fixed crash when restoring an episode progress;

- Fixed crash in in-app purchase panel for devices with the operative system's version minor than 13.0;

- Enabled Marquee for "continue watching" content's title in the VOD list;

- Improved logic which calculates the next episode and relative user interface;

- Other minor crash fixes and bug fixes.

- IMPROVED: hidden channels and protected channels will take into account if their category of appartenance is hidden or protected, regardless of where they appear (including 'added recently', favorites, and continue watchings);

- IMPROVED: you can now take more actions (like hiding a channel or adding it to a parental control), even on special categories such as favorites or continue watchings;

- IMPROVED: data structure in the project to offer more functionalities, and make the app more efficient;

- FIX: preview starting for the first channel when the live tab appear, although the channel was protected;

- FIX: hidden channels UI in live tab when hiding an entire category;

- FIX: show play icon in movie details page;

- Other minor improvements.

- NEW: We are happy to introduce the Spanish language!

- NEW: metadata section in settings! It shows also the percentage of metadata associations made;

- FIXED: metadata not showing the first time a content was opened from search;

- IMPROVED: thanks to the recent architectural changes, we'll clean your metadata associations from channels that don't longer exists, such that we can prevent the occupied storage to growing constantly if not needed;

- IMPROVED: vertical live channels list will scroll back when switching category;

- Updated terms and conditions (third party services section);

- Several fixes.

- NEW mobile download / watch offline functionality;

- BIG IMPROVEMENT: changed player architecture to improve VLC stability and prevent VLC crashes;

- FIXED player's hardware vs software acceleration;

- FIXED player's buffer window option;

- FIXED added recently for live tab;

- FIXED focus / UI when switching between VOD categories to VOD channels;

- FIXED white screen when zapping;

- FIXED parental control - protected channels couldn't be effectively watched even inserting the PIN;

- IMPROVED player's progress bar tolerance, for better control;

- Other small improvements.
- Fixes.
- Hotfix for movie download;
- Fixes;

- NEW: video casting functionality for iOS - you can now cast on all your Google devices!

- NEW: added In-App purchase panel button directly in the main playlist screen;

- IMPROVED: TV Guide will download your logos hosted on third party services such as dropbox (like it happens for the Live tab);

- IMPROVED: slightly the titles cleaner (reload your playlist if you want to clean again your title);

- IMPROVED: auto-scroll back live channel list when changing category;

- FIXED: EPG - we found and fixed some memory issues that were affecting the EPGs allocation, and the EPGs Shift;

- FIXED: "Continue watching" on iOS;

- FIXED: channel preview was starting playing in the background when switching to the Lives tab with the horizontal layout;

- Some other minor fixes;

- Updated terms and conditions;
- Fixed more bugs;

- NEW: redeem promo code button in in-app purchase panel;

- NEW: deinterlace mode "bob";

- IMPROVED: prefix "FR " will be auto-cleaned from titles (reload your playlist);

- FIXED: catchup content opened from EPG Guide;

- FIXED: random crash while searching;

- NEW: button in settings to complete the metadata associations automatically - this will give you more recommendations and will allow more and more feature that will come in the future;

- FIX: release date for TV Shows;

- Other dev fixes;

- New: top-shelf refurbished;

- New: iOS Home Widget - https://support.apple.com/HT20712 to know more;

- New: on iOS, the audio will continue to play if the app is temporarily sent in the background;

- Fix: episodes parsing (especially in SMB playlist);

- Various feedbacks and errors improvements.
Crash fix;

- Fixed: parsing episodes when in the wrong order;

- Fixed: widget live channels shapes;

- Fixed: error message for TV Guide when there are not live channels in the playlist;

- Fixed: playlist episode parsing for certain cases;

- Improved: handle malformed xtream API tv shows format;
- NEW: "Content management panel" in your playlist settings.
- Fixed iOS 12 crash / some UI;
Fixed an old crash.

- NEW: download of catchup/TV archive programs;

- Fixed hidden channels / categories in search and TV Guide.

- Improved cleaning of titles algorithm.

- NEW: download of catchup/TV archive programs;

- Fixed hidden channels / categories in search and TV Guide.

- Improved cleaning of titles algorithm;

- Fixed iOS 12 UI.

- New native player for you supported content;

- Native player video AirPlay on other devices that support Apple AirPlay;

- Native player picture in picture (PIP) - even with the app in background mode;

- [AppleTV] Native player Content / Screen refresh frequency matching (FPS match);

- VLC custom audio delay;

- EPG's URL will be automatically extracted from the playlist (where present), during its parsing, in case it wasn't inserted manually in the playlist's settings;

- Fixed: parental control when entering the channel management section;

- Fixed: opening a channel on iPad portrait from TV Guide, was always rotating the screen;

- Fixed: the "next episode" button on iOS was covered by the chrome.
- Fixes.

- New favorites custom order for FULL subscribers (Settings tab - Channels management);

- New featured movie and TV Show on iOS;

- Improved iOS UI;

- Increased font for VOD's overview for tvOS;

- Fixed: tap on "cast/actors" was making the app crash;

- Fixed: live channel EPG current program subtitle wasn't loading for some content;

- Fixed: EPG shift setting was lost after the reload of the playlist;

- Fixed: subtitles were enabled automatically although disabled from settings;

- Fixed: match FPS default setting wasn't always working;

- Fixed: crash due to PIP on iOS minor than 14.2;

- Other minor fixes.

- New: the player will use all your audio outputs (ie. if you have Dolby 5.1 it will use all speakers);

- New: default VLC audio delay setting in the settings tab;

- Fixed: crash when deleting a playlist;

- Fixed: crash on iOS introduced with the new featured movie header;

- Fixed: long press crash in certain cases;

- Fixed: memory leaks that kept the players allocated;

- Fixed: another random crash due to the system;

- Improved: categories' name's font for tvOS;

- New screenshots;

- Minor fixes.

- New: "See all" for easy VOD categories' channels navigation (for iOS, soon for AppleTV too);

- New: settings tab refurbished and new social links and actions;

- Fix: problem adding to favorites or keep watchings too big channels;

- Improvement: audio / subtitles delay supports 0.5 intervals;

- Improvements: added logs to tracks certain crashes;

- Fix: Player stability and errors;

- Fix: SMB wasn't playing;

- Fix: videocast wasn't working for downloaded/offline content;

- Fix: resolved a crash.

- Updated privacy policy.

- New logo;

- NEW: "See all" for tvOS (long press on channel or tap on lateral categories);

- FIX: Some French translation.

- In app purchase panel improvements on iOS;

- Some fix.
